meanings.definition: A room or rooms in which goods are sold.
meanings.sent1: The salesrooms were filled with various products for customers to buy.
meanings.sent2: Customers visited the salesrooms to purchase items they needed.
meanings.sent3: The salesrooms were so busy that the products started talking to each other!
meanings.sent4: In the salesrooms, the goods danced off the shelves into the customers' hands.
meanings.sent5: The salesrooms buzzed with activity as people eagerly shopped for bargains.

meanings.definition: A room or rooms where sales are conducted.
meanings.sent1: The salesrooms had a long line of customers waiting to make their purchases.
meanings.sent2: The company's sales team gathered in the salesrooms to discuss their strategies.
meanings.sent3: The salesrooms were so quiet that you could hear a pin drop.
meanings.sent4: In the salesrooms, deals were made that changed the course of the business.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights in the salesrooms beckoned customers inside to explore the products.
